vsParam:
Uh, Marjoram Sensei?
W, what's wrong with you? You look terrible!

I ran out of an expensive medicine. I wanted to make some,
but I realized that I didn't have enough ingredients...

Can you help me gather those ingredients if it's OK for you?
I need to make some preparations...

Marjoram Sensei...
She seems pretty depressed.

Perhaps the situation is bad.
Let's go gather the ingredients.

Marjoram Sensei!
We have collected the materials for your medicine!

It's you... Oh, thank you so much!
Well...
Now I'm able to treat students who fall down and get hurt!

Uh? M, Marjoram Sensei, you use such an expensive medicine
for everyone falling down!?
Wh-why would you use such an expensive medicine?

Because it has a better effect.
Way more effective than other medicine!

Th-that being said,
would it be too exaggerated?

You are so good to us,
and we are all inspired...

But your kindness and care also make students inclined to
depend on you, and it will hinder their self-growth!

You are right... Maybe some students would come to teachers
and ask for medicine they can make by themselves.

I see...
Sorel, what you said does make sense.

So it means, I have to be cruel sometimes?
Let me think about it...
